name: Minimalist Daily Planner & Journal (with Buttons)
description: Organize your daily schedules, to-dos & reflections all in-one-place!Do you journal or like to plan out your day? I sure do, it not only keeps my day organized but also helps to reflect on daily observations & experiences. We do not learn from experience, we learn from reflecting on experience- John DeweyThis minimalist planner & journal is designed to organize your life & declutter your thoughts. What's Included? automated daily entry & task setup (with new Buttons function)
